column4: can ubuntu run at a decent speed on my 700mhz p3 with 256mb ram laptop?
beacause from the live cd that i downloaded (6.10) its been running kinda slow
it depends on what you want to do with it, which desktop environment etc. large applications e.g. openoffice might swap a bit
well i will be using gnome.. but no office org or anything like that. I use it for network security, and wireless securty
